data.actual_result: The ⚠️ shows on Desktop but it's a 🔒 on Android
data.expected_result: Even though only a certain role can access it, the ⚠️ should still show
data.short_description: NSFW channel icon isn't consistent across clients
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new channel - Have it so only a certain role can access it - After that mark it as NSFW
